stories.name: Symphony of Starlight
stories.description: A young bard with a celestial connection embarks on a quest to restore harmony to the shattered constellations and prevent a cosmic calamity.
stories.main_character: Lyra, a bard gifted with the power to manipulate starlight
characters: Eldryn, a wise and enigmatic celestial guide
Corvus, a mischievous shapeshifter with a hidden past
stories.author: Arin Emir

stories.name: Echoes of the Sunken Spire
stories.description: A group of unlikely heroes delve into the ruins of a forgotten underwater city, seeking a lost artifact and confronting a lurking danger.
characters: Kael, a stoic paladin haunted by his past
Zaria, a powerful but enigmatic sorceress
stories.author: Arin Emir

stories.name: Whispers of the Machine God
stories.description: On a desolate industrial world, a tech-priest on a pilgrimage uncovers a conspiracy that threatens to unleash an ancient mechanical horror.
stories.main_character: Cyrus, a devout tech-priest with a troubled past
characters: Sienna, a cunning rogue with a hidden agenda
Thrax, a hulking cybernetic warrior sworn to protect Cyrus
stories.author: Arin Emir
